snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg told reporters at a news conference Thursday not to ask him any questions about the 2013 mayoral race.
abstract: Mayor Michael R Bloomberg, in an abrupt soliloquy during an event, tells reporters not to ask him questions about the upcoming 2013 mayoral race, saying he does not want to spend the year answering questions about his potential successor or the candidates.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg told reporters at a news conference Thursday not to ask him any questions about the 2013 mayoral race.

headline.seo: Bloomberg Says Don’t Ask Him About 2013 Mayoral Race
headline.main: 2013 Race? Mayor Says Don’t Ask About It
